attributes.action: Save Buckinghamshire Fire Service Control Room
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned citizens wish to register our opposition to the Bucks Fire Authority's decision to outsource Command and Control operations to Cambridgeshire Fire & Rescue Service.

We believe the people of Buckinghamshire will be put at risk due to lack of necessary local knowledge.  We ask that the Fire Authority provide evidence to demonstrate that the service to the public will not be diminished.

We believe alternative working arrangements should be considered and cuts to front line services should be avoided at all possible costs.
